website_summaries.verdict: You'll work a bit harder to blow this option up, but the overall build is more durable than a lot of other air mats out there.
pros: Well-constructed from double-wall fabric with 3-ply PVC
Comes with a hand pump, carry bag, and a repair kit
Available in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Some buyers report that this option arrived with a broken pump
Hand pump isn't as convenient as an electric

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking an inflatable air floor, my daughter can play gymnastics at home.This is a great product,well constructed .It's very simple to inflate and deflate.My daughter are very happy she have the 118 inches mat.We received it in 4 days from date of shipment,which was nearly 4 weeks earlier than expected.Now she can safely and effectively play gymnastics at home.And this mat also can use at water,“this is the best gift for this season ” my daughter said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for competitive gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Much better than I even anticipated. I have 3 competitive gymnasts and this is perfect and sturdy and can take a beating
customer_reviews.author: D. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Son has been wanting one for a long time. This is a great option for someone who doesn’t want to spend a lot of money. Very durable, material feels very thick and sturdy. Not a fan of the hand pump, had to rig the end of the tube to fit our electric pump instead of spending half the day pumping it up by hand. Overall a great product and keeps my child entertained and outside for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adlpchris

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: This item was a birthday gift for my son that loves to do gymnastics. It only lasted about 1 month and now it will not keep any air in it. Can't find any hole/leaks but still loses air very quickly. It is also very hard when blown up. Too hard for my boys to practice gymnastics without have a spotter to make sure they don't land on their heads. Not bouncy like they advertise it to be. Already having to look for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this for 3 months now. Everyone loves it. It can stay in the front room and absorbs all the bouncing so nothing fragile in that room even moves. The spring in it is great. He's mastered back flips on it. Can't wait to take it outside this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Not so scrappy

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned seven and she is 50" tall. She is using half of it. I think this is for adult. Light weighted and easy to pump . Sturdier than I thought thou, feels like gym floor.
customer_reviews.author: Parveen

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas and loves It! It is durable bouncy and seems like it is of good quality. Love that the filling hole has a valve to stop the air from coming out. This is great for her cheer tumbling practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy on the body
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, my daughter loves this! Uses it daily. Safe and easy on the body. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Corrinne

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy. Also comes with a storage duffel for easy ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mat. It comes with a hand pump but we attach the hose to an air blower. Quick and easy. Also comes with a storage duffel for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Leuck

customer_reviews.title: it takes a few minutes to pump it up
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it, it's just what she needed to practice gymnastics in a safer manner.
customer_reviews.author: James Verhage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and uses it all the time. Package arrived as advertised and on time. My only wish is that I had gone with a longer size but space is an issue so the 10ft will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. The quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. The quality is great. The kids (and kids at heart) love it. I don't know why I thought something about this mat would not live up to expectations but it certainly has and more. Plus it was shipped to me incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. My daughter loves it. She is a level 3 gymnast and is on it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for practicing back handsprings and other skills
customer_reviews.author: J.Ouzts

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.text: Received fast and it's very durable was just the right size for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Contact?
customer_reviews.text: This has been great quality until recently.. it is leaking air..we purchased this almost two years ago. Is the warranty still valid? Have been talking with Amazon they cant find a contact for you either..help!
customer_reviews.author: mom

product_meta.title: Darget 9.8ft Air Track Tumbling Mat Inflatable Gymnastic Floor with Pump (Orange Air Floor:3m /9.8'x 1m /39" x10cm /4")
